channel.title: SKLearn on home
channel.description: Recent content in SKLearn on home

item.title: Data Industry job market analysis
item.description: An analysis of the current Data Industry job market in Australia looking into factors that affect salaries and distinguish between roles. These problems were tackled using Natural Language Processing techniques to breakdown the job descriptions provided and assessed using a Classification model approach to parse out determining features between the desired groups of jobs. Data gathering: The data role details were gathered from SEEK (seek.com.au), with a focus on three key job titles; Data Scientist, Data Analyst and Data Engineer.

item.title: Housing market analysis
item.description: A dive into the Ames housing dataset that describes the sale of individual residential property in Ames, Iowa, USA between 2006 and 2010. Exploratory Data Analysis: Dataset included a total of 1460 data points with 80 Features Focus on Residential properties, so all Commercial properties were removed from the dataset - equated to ~4.5% of total data Generally dataset was messy with multiple occurrences of missing data. Retention of good data was considered key, so imputation of data was preferred as opposed to simply dropping records.
